intro.title: Introduction
intro.text1: (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") respects the privacy of our users and is committed to protecting personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what information the Service collects and how it is used and protected.
intro.text2: By using the Service, you are deemed to have agreed to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, please refrain from using the Service.

account.title: 1. Account Information
account.description: The Service uses Manus OAuth authentication for login. Upon login, the following information is obtained from your Manus account.

inputData.title: 2. Input Data
inputData.description: When using the Service's features, you will input the following information.

generatedData.title: 3. Generated Data
generatedData.description: The following data generated by AI is saved.
items: Generated documents such as career summaries, motivation letters, and self-PR

apiKey.title: 4. API Keys
apiKey.description: The Service requires you to set an API key for OpenAI or Gemini. API keys are encrypted and stored in the database, and are only used when executing AI functions.

usageData.description: To improve the Service, the following usage data may be collected.

usage.description: Collected information is used for the following purposes.

protection.title: Information Protection
protection.description: The Service takes the following measures to protect users' personal information.

encryption.title: 1. Data Encryption
encryption.description: Sensitive information such as API keys is encrypted and stored in the database. Communications are encrypted with HTTPS.

accessControl.title: 2. Access Control
accessControl.description: Only the user can access their personal information. Other users or third parties cannot access it.

security.title: 3. Security Measures
security.description: Appropriate security measures are implemented to prevent unauthorized access, tampering, and leakage.

thirdParty.title: Disclosure to Third Parties
thirdParty.description: The Service does not provide users' personal information to third parties except in the following cases.

aiProvider.title: 1. AI API Providers
aiProvider.description1: The Service uses OpenAI or Gemini AI APIs to generate documents. Entered resumes and job postings are sent to AI API providers.
aiProvider.description2: Please review each provider's privacy policy.

legal.title: 2. Legal Requests
legal.description: Personal information may be disclosed if there is a disclosure request based on laws or a court order.

consent.title: 3. User Consent
consent.description: Personal information may be provided to third parties with user consent.

retention.title: Data Retention Period
retention.description: The Service retains user data for the following periods.

account.title: 1. Account Information
account.description: Retained until the account is deleted.

generated.title: 2. Generated Data
generated.description: Retained until deleted by the user.

apiKey.title: 3. API Keys
apiKey.description: Retained until deleted by the user.

access.title: 1. Right to Access
access.description: Right to access and review your personal information

correction.title: 2. Right to Correction
correction.description: Right to request correction of personal information

deletion.title: 3. Right to Deletion
deletion.description: Right to request deletion of personal information

portability.title: 4. Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Right to transfer personal information to other services
